span.t: This date is on the future. Make sure it is what you expected.

button.t-attf-class: {{ icon || displayCaret || displayChevron ? 'd-flex align-items-center ' : ''}} {{ displayCaret || displayChevron ? 'pr-1 ' : ''}}

i.t-attf-class: o_dropdown_chevron fa fa-fw ml-auto fa-chevron-{{ state.open ? 'down' : 'right' }}
o_icon_right fa fa-fw mr-n4 fa-caret-{{ state.open ? 'down' : 'right' }}

a.t-att-class: { selected: props.isActive, [props.className]: props.className, 'd-flex': props.removable, 'align-items-center': props.removable, 'justify-content-between': props.removable }

i.class: o_icon_right fa fa-trash btn btn-link text-danger p-0 mr-n3
i.title: Delete item

button.class: fa fa-chevron-left btn btn-secondary o_pager_previous rounded-left
button.title: Previous page

button.class: fa fa-chevron-right btn btn-secondary o_pager_next rounded-right
button.title: Next page

li.t-att-class: { o_indent: src.parent and !src.parent.selection, o_selection_focus: src_index === state.focusedItem }

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-light fa fa-lg o_switch_view o_{{ view.type }} {{ view.icon }}

div.class: o_list_selection_box alert alert-info d-inline-flex align-items-center pl-0 px-lg-2 py-0 mb-0 ml-2

main.p:
This update will only consider the records of the current page.
Among the selected records, are valid for this update.
Are you sure you want to perform the following update on those records ?

div.div:
Hit ENTER to SAVE
Hit ESCAPE to DISCARD

Hit ENTER to CREATE
Hit DOWN to navigate to the list below

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-icon fa fa-refresh o_refresh_count
button.title: Refresh

t.div: Select a model to add a filter.

div.t: Match records with the following rule:

button.class: btn btn-sm btn-primary fa fa-plus o_domain_leaf_value_add_tag_button
button.title: Add tag

li.t-attf-class: o_field_selector_item #{relationToFollow and 'o_field_selector_next_page' or 'o_field_selector_select_button'}#{line_index == 0 and ' active' or ''}

t.t-value: ['No color', 'Red', 'Orange', 'Yellow', 'Light blue', 'Dark purple', 'Salmon pink', 'Medium blue', 'Dark blue', 'Fushia', 'Green', 'Purple']

button.title: Current state
button.t-attf-class: btn o_arrow_button btn-primary disabled #{is_dropdown ? 'dropdown-item bg-primary text-white': ''}

button.title: Not active state, click to change it

t.t-attf-aria-label: Click to change current state to #{i.display_name}

div.div: By clicking Adopt and Sign, I agree that the chosen signature/initials will be a valid electronic representation of my hand-written signature/initials for all purposes when it is used on documents, including legally binding contracts.

div.label: I want to update data (import-compatible export)

div.class: col-12 col-md-6 d-flex o_right_panel mt-3 mt-md-0

div.div:
Get this feature and much more with Odoo Enterprise!
Access to all Enterprise Apps
New design
Mobile support
Upgrade to future versions
Bugfixes guarantee
And more
